This page covers biological details of component Frontal Eye Field.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Cortex -> Anterior Lobe (NC.LOBE.ANT) -> Premotor Cortex (NC.PMC) -> Frontal Eye Field (NMA.NC.PMC.FEF) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: cortex
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaNMA Neocortical Brain - Motor Aggregation Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 08
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Initiation of eye movements
  * *Notes to function*: Voluntary saccades and pursuit eye movements
